short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help curate a data set of pages that open in-page pop-ups by reporting the URLs of such pages as you encounter them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help curate a data set of pages that open in-page pop-ups by reporting the URLs of such pages as you encounter them during your browsing. Mozilla is experimenting with a browser feature to detect such pop-ups automatically and block them.
